page.title: 19RECREATION
page.content: There are several privately owned sports grounds. Smiths Industry have their main ground East of the A435 near the junction with Southam Lane.It caters for rugby,football,tennis, cricket and hockey.Indoors the facilities are photography,abseiling, swimming,squash and other indoor activities.This ground used to belong to Kaytes Farm.In Bishop's Cleeve,N. of the Stoke Road is a Soccer Ground, and in Swindon Village,Eagle Star Insurance have a Sports Ground,which caters for rugby,soccer,tennis and hockey with an indoor Games Club and Bar. There is an Indoor and Outdoor Rifle Club Range ,S. of the Stoke Road,open on Tuesday evenings and some Sundays. The former Homestead Farm is now a Riding Centre.There is a disused Camping Site off the Stoke Road and nearby a large Mobile Home Park.
